Control Name: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information—Personal information is accurate and complete for the purposes for which it is to be used.

control_attributes.Control: Ensures Accuracy and Completeness of Personal Information—Personal information is accurate and complete for the purposes for which it is to be used.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P7.1 The entity collects and maintains accurate, up-to-date, complete, and relevant personal information to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy
